lemma candidate_values_renaming: assumes "(candidate_values z CC C' C s L L' \<sigma> t' s' t S)" assumes "finite C'" assumes "finite (cl_ecl (D:: 'a eclause))" assumes "closed_under_renaming S" assumes "Ball S well_constrained" shows "\<exists> CC_bis C'_bis L'_bis \<sigma>_bis t'_bis s'_bis t_bis. (candidate_values z CC_bis C'_bis C s L L'_bis \<sigma>_bis t'_bis s'_bis t S) \<and> (vars_of_cl (cl_ecl D)) \<inter> vars_of_cl (cl_ecl CC_bis) = {}"
